articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Tank Division
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Tank Division
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected Guard Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Tank Division 105 of the KPA honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment and congratulated its servicepersons on the New Year.
					 The servicepersons enthusiastically welcomed him and offered him the warmest New Year greetings, representing the profound reverence of all the servicepersons of the KPA. 
					
					 He warmly congratulated the servicepersons on the New Year, acknowledging their enthusiastic cheers.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the unit's performance of duty and mounted a reviewing stand to watch tankmen in training.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all the servicepersons of the division have grown to be a-match-for-a-hundred fighters fully prepared to beat any formidable enemy and put forward highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 He took warm care of the living of the servicepersons, looking round an education room, bedroom and other places of the unit.
					
					 Tank Division 105 is a model not only in combat and political training but also in the management of the unit and supply service and in all other aspects, he said, adding that this signal change that has taken place in the unit fully shows the quality, appearance and discipline of the KPA put on a highly regular basis. 
					
					 Seeing diverse art works and other things created by soldiers, he said that the servicepersons of the KPA have become a model for the society in idea, morality, culture and all other aspects, adding that the days spent by soldiers are, indeed, like a course of the Songun revolution university as they help them know what is a revolution, how dear the country is to them and all aspects of their lives. 
					
					 He appreciated an art performance given by servicepersons of a company under the division. 
					
					 He highly appreciated the revolutionary and militant spirit of the soldiers of the company and their lifestyle, pleased to see them living and struggling full of confidence and optimism, loudly singing songs of the revolutionary army. 
					
					 He had a photograph taken with the servicepersons of the division.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Myong Guk and Ri Myong Su and other leading commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolian Party Leader
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Sanjaageen Bayar, chairman of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Mongolia on Dec. 30 last year by the secretary of the party.

articles.title: Holders of Academic Degrees and Titles Grow in Number
articles.content:
Holders of Academic Degrees and Titles Grow in Number
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The number of holders of academic degrees and titles is steadily increasing in the DPRK.
					Over the last decade tens of thousands of people have been honored with academic degrees and titles, academicians, professors and doctors included.
					
					 This strikingly shows the correctness of the idea of giving priority to science, the policy of attaching importance to talents, of the Workers' Party of Korea which has set forth science and technology as one of the three pillars for the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Among doctors, there are more than 40 functionaries on service in national institutions, industrial establishments, co-op farms, stock-farms and other units and workers.
					
					The number of the women who have been awarded doctorate from Juche 87 (1998) reaches a hundred and tens, five times that in the preceding years.
					
					 This proves that the women are playing a big role in the development of science and technology in the Songun era.
					
					 Also young men and women with academic degrees and titles are growing in number.
					
					 Lots of young scientists have made a positive contribution to pioneering various cutting-edge scientific fields and developing information technology and basic science, winning doctorate in their 20s and 30s. More than 20,000 young people have joined the ranks of holders of academic degrees and titles.
					
					 Many families whose members are possessed of academic degrees and titles have come into being. Among them are a family in which the father and son are doctors, doctor twins, an academician's scientist family in which the father and his three sons are doctors and his grand children are holders of academic degrees and titles, a family with over five certificates including academician, professor and doctor and a family in which the father and his two sons are academician and doctors.
					
					 Now scientists, technicians and holders of academic degrees and titles are striving hard to put the country's science and technology on a higher stage and fling open the gate to the great, prosperous and powerful nation at an early date with greater scientific and technological achievements.

articles.title: Workers of Kangson Take Lead in Great Revolutionary Upsurge
articles.content:
Workers of Kangson Take Lead in Great Revolutionary Upsurge
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made a victorious advance of revolution amid flames of the great revolutionary upsurge.
					Standing in the van of the great revolutionary upsurge are the workers of Kangson with ardent patriotism to prop up the country with big steel pillars.
					
					 Right after the liberation of the country President Kim Il Sung said that steel was needed to build a new democratic country. In response to his call, they repaired within only two months an electric furnace destroyed by the Japanese imperialists and made the first teeming, thus stirring up the militant morale and revolutionary enthusiasm of the people in the efforts for building a new country.
					
					 Following the Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in December Juche 45 (1956) where the President made a speech calling for effecting an upsurge in the socialist construction, he called on the working class of Kangson and said that ten thousand more tons of steel would be greatly helpful to the country and that the difficult situation of the revolution should be bridged over, he trusting them and they trusting him. His deep trust gave birth to the legendary Chollima (winged horse) in Kangson.
					
					 The workers there, who raised the first torch of the Chollima movement, effected a great upswing in production, withstanding all sorts of bottlenecks and difficulties. In the course of this, they wrought a miracle of rolling 120,000 tons of steel bars at the blooming mill with a rated capacity of 60,000 tons.
					
					 They, always true to the leadership of the WPK, have made uninterrupted creation and innovation century after century. 
					
					 They successfully built a Korean-style UHP electric arc furnace, which may be called the core of the steel industry, by themselves last year when the 60th birth anniversary of the DPRK was celebrated.
					
					 To build the above-said furnace, which is said only its design would take more than three years, was a difficult undertaking the impossibility of which was greater than the possibility under the present condition where everything is short and difficult.
					
					 However, the workers in Kangson, with a firm determination to make another revolutionary leap forward in the steel production in the spirit and the fortitude of the great Chollima upsurge after the war, built the UHP electric arc furnace in a few months with their own design, technology and efforts, opening up a bright vista for boosting the steel production rapidly.
					
					Holding higher the torch of a new revolutionary surge kindled by General Secretary  Kim Jong Il while giving field guidance to the Chollima Steel Complex in December last year, they are registering big successes from the first day work in the new year.

articles.title: U.S. Bellicose Forces' Reckless Nuclear War Hysteria Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Bellicose Forces' Reckless Nuclear War Hysteria Flayed
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Air Force is contemplating replacing all the window curtains of cockpits and fuselages of B-52s with heat-resistant ones from this year, asserting that there is limitation in preventing the heat and rays to be caused during the explosion of nuclear bombs right after their drop.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					This patently proves what extent the nuclear war hysteria of the U.S. bellicose forces have reached as this design is worked out on the premise of a start of a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. war-thirsty forces' moves to mount a preemptive nuclear attack are assuming an increasing danger.
					
					 The basic aim of the U.S. nuclear strategy is to make a preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					 The U.S. replaced the "strategy for nuclear containment" worked out in the period of the Cold War with a strategy to mount a preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					The U.S. is putting spurs to the modernization of nuclear forces, regarding them as the mainstay of the military strategy in the new century.
					
					 It has steadily rounded off the nuclear attack system by mobilizing a lot of nuclear attack means for various forms of military exercises.
					
					 The said strategic bombers are playing a pivotal role in the U.S. strategic nuclear forces as the latest-type preemptive nuclear strike means.
					
					 A few days ago, U.S. Congressmen were reported to have cried out for modernizing the U.S. naval warships and increasing their number in a bid to cope with the moves of the potential hostile states including Russia and China to beef up their naval forces. This outpouring is aimed at creating a favorable condition for realizing the U.S. scenario for making a preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					 It is the strategic intention of the U.S. to round off the modernization of its nuclear forces and contain hostile states with an unchallenged nuclear edge and thus establish world-wide hegemony.
					
					 The world today is not the one as the U.S. considers to be.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the reality and drop its dangerous scenario for a preemptive nuclear attack.

articles.title: U.S. Contradictory Stance on Nuclear Issue Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Contradictory Stance on Nuclear Issue Slammed
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The United States claims that nuclear activity in a certain country poses a problem while other country's nuclear activity does not pose any. This contradictory stance on the nuclear issue comes under fire by a signed commentary of Minju Joson Friday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 An interim report recently released by the U.S. Congressional Sub-Committee, Strategic Forces, pulling up the DPRK and Iran, asserted that the unbroken cases of nuclear proliferation perpetrated by them out of their "nuclear ambitions" might help nukes find their way to terrorist groups and it is, therefore, necessary for the U.S. to pursue a global strategy for nuclear non-proliferation and keep trustworthy and safe nukes capable of containing not only hostile countries but its allies.
					
					 In another development, the U.S. is now mulling the conclusion of nuclear agreements with some countries in the Mideast.
					
					 This indicates that the U.S. nuclear policy is devoid of a clear-cut standard and yardstick and it changes this or that way, depending on the country concerned.
					
					 The nuclear issues that surfaced worldwide at present are directly or indirectly attributable to the U.S. unjust nuclear policy.
					
					 The U.S. has perpetrated military provocations and posed grave nuclear threats to the non-nuclear states including the DPRK in the past, reneging on its commitment not to pose such threat to the non-nuclear states.
					
					 On the contrary, it has zealously supported its followers in their nuclear weaponization in violation of international law.
					
					 A typical example of this is Israel.
					
					 Israel is believed to possess about 200 nuclear weapons at present.
					
					 This is the stance of the U.S. which pretends to be opposed to the nuclear proliferation.
					
					 The U.S. is handling the nuclear issue in a way to meet its own strategic interests only.
					
					 The U.S. is classifying different countries in the world into this or that group as far as the nuclear issue is concerned. This biased attitude of the U.S. only makes the nuclear issue more complicated.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can pass the buck for the nuclear proliferation to somebody else.
					
					 The U.S. can never evade the responsibility for having spread nukes.

articles.title: Stop to Moves to Control Media Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Moves to Control Media Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The Media Action of south Korea grouping 48 civic and public organizations called a press conference in Seoul on December 30 last year at which it demanded a stop to the Lee Myung Bak puppet group's moves to put media under its control, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 It accused the Lee Myung Bak group of instigating the "Grand National Party" to railroad seven evil bills, in fact, despite the opposition of the overwhelming majority of the people to the said evil bills aimed at putting media under its control.
					
					 It urged Lee Myung Bak to scrap the evil bills, owning the responsibility for having driven the society to mayhem.

articles.title: Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Observed in Mongolia
articles.content:
Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Observed in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony for a Mongolian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was held in Ulan Bator on Dec. 24 last year.
					 Present there were personages of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, Mongolian Border Guard Unit 0151, the Mongolian HUM Company Ltd. and the Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten in Ulan Bator.
					
					 At the ceremony Ch. Surenjav, chairman of the society, was elected chairman of the committee. 
					
					 The committee fixed the period from Jan. 2 to Apr. 25 as a commemoration period and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in this period.

articles.title: International Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Feb. 16 Formed
articles.content:
International Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Feb. 16 Formed
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The International Preparatory Committee for Celebrating February 16 was inaugurated in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia on December 23 last year.
					 It groups a deputy to the State Duma of Russia, a member of the Sejm of Poland, Grachov, first vice-chairman of the Foreign Policy Committee of the Supreme Council of Ukraine, and other figures from various circles of parliaments, political parties and organizations of Belarus, Kazakhstan, Moldova and other countries.
					
					 It decided to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and the Songun politics and hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of February 16.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions took place in Russia, Bulgaria, Poland and Mexico from December 15 to 28 last year on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 On display in the venues of the exhibitions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos showing their feats, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts representing the wisdom and skills of the Korean people.
					
					 The opening ceremonies of exhibitions were attended by personages and people from various circles of those countries. 
					
					 Several attendants spoke there. 
					
					 The director of the Cultural Department of Kaluga Region of Russia said that today the DPRK is dynamically pushing forward socialist construction despite trials and difficulties in its way. The world is expressing admiration at the achievements made by the DPRK, he said, noting that no force on earth can match the Korean people under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The curator of a history museum in Panagyurishte City of Bulgaria said that the DPRK which is standing firm guard over socialism is shattering the ambition of the U.S. and other international reactionaries to dominate the world, after holding the full-fledged status of a military power. The Korean people are sure to emerge victorious as they are holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem, the curator stressed.
					
					 The curator of an art gallery in Puebla City of Mexico expressed hope that the exhibition would offer the Mexican people an opportunity to know better about Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk whom the Korean people deeply revere, and greatly help them deepen the friendly feelings towards the Korean people.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed in Uganda
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Uganda
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the Lugazi Branch of the Uganda-DPRK Friendship Association, lectures were given by the Juche Idea Study Group of the Department of Teacher Education and Expansion and the Juche Idea Study Group of the Department of Psychology of Kyambogo University, Uganda, and a reading session on "Biography of Comrade Kim Jong Il" was held by the National Women's Council of Uganda in the period from December 18 to 22 last year on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					Chairman of the Lugazi Branch of the Uganda-DPRK Friendship Association S. N. Serwanga who is secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People and other speakers said that the Korean people have firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and achieved great successes in building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation while valiantly repulsing all obstructions of the imperialists as they are wisely led by Kim Jong Il, peerlessly brilliant commander.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk performed undying feats in the anti-Japanese war for the liberation of the country with arms in her hands and in the building of new Korea, they noted, adding that her desire is being successfully realized by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Auma-Okumu, head of the Juche Idea Study Group of the Department of Psychology of Kyambogo University, Uganda, in a lecture titled "Woman General of Mt. Paektu" said that Kim Jong Suk participated in the sacred war for national liberation led by President Kim Il Sung in her early years and defeated the Japanese imperialist aggressors with her extraordinary military wisdom, distinguished stratagem, matchless grit, excellent bravery and mysterious marksmanship and was highly revered as anti-Japanese war hero.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid by Cubans
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid by Cubans
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- An event of laying a floral basket before a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung was held at Kim Il Sung Economic Special School in Cuba on Dec. 30 last year on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					 Present there were personages of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples and Kim Il Sung Economic Special School and people of Cuba and the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 They placed a basket of flowers before the portrait of the smiling President and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente del presidente del PPRM
articles.content:
S 010203 - Kim Jong Il recibe presente del presidente del PPRM
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera el presidente del Partido Popular Revolucionario de Mongolia con motivo del Ano Nuevo 98 (2009) de la Era Juche.
					El secretario de este partido lo entrego el pasado 30 de diciembre al embajador coreano en su pais.

articles.title: Aumentan poseedores de grados academicos y categorias docents
articles.content:
Aumentan poseedores de grados academicos y categorias docentes
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ATCC) -- En Corea no cesan de incrementarse los poseedores de grados academicos y categorias docentes.
					En los ultimos 10 anos salieron decenas de miles de poseedores de titulos de Academicos, Profesores y Doctores.
					
					Esto demuestra claramente la vitalidad de la idea y politica de dar importancia a las ciencias y personas talentosas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que  presento la ciencia y tecnica como uno de tres pilares de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Mas de 40 doctores son obreros, funcionarios y trabajadores de los organismos centrales, fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas y ganaderas.
					
					Desde el 87 (1998) de la Era Juche hasta la fecha ciento y decenas de mujeres recibieron el doctorado. Esta cifra representa un aumento de 5 veces en comparacion con el periodo anterior.
					
					Esto demuestra que en la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) las mujeres cumplen tambien un gran rol en el desarrollo cientifico y tecnico del pais.
					
					Tambien, aumento el numero de los jovenes poseedores de grados academicos y categorias docentes.
					
					 Muchos cientificos juveniles dominaron varias esferas cientificas de punta contribuyendo asi al desarrollo de la informatica y ciencias basicas. Asi, obtuvieron el titulo de doctor a los veinte y treinta anos de edad. Mas de 20 mil jovenes son poseedores de grados academicos y categorias docentes.
					
					 Existen muchas familias de poseedores de grados academicos y categorias docentes. El padre y su hijo de la familia son doctores, existen doctores gemelos, el padre y sus tres hijos son doctores con nieto de grados academicos; la familia con mas de 5 certificados de Academico, Profesor y Doctor y otros titulos cientificos y la familia del padre y dos hijos que son Academicos y Doctores.
					
					 Ahora, ellos se esfuerzan activamente por llevar al nivel alto las ciencias y tecnicas del pais y abrir lo mas pronto posible con grandes exitos cientificos y tecnicos la gran puerta de la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia fanatismo de EE.UU. por guerra nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia fanatismo de EE.UU. por guerra nuclear
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ATCC) -- Las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas intentan cambiar a partir de este ano todas las cortinas en la cabina de piloto y en el cuerpo de los bombarderos estrategicos "B-52" por las resistentes a la alta temperatura pretextando que ellas son defectuosas para bloquear el calor y los rayos que se produzcan en el momento de explosion de la bomba atomica lanzada.
					Esta medida, que tiene por premisa la provocacion de la guerra nuclear, muestra claramente a que grado llego el fanatismo de los belicistas norteamericanos por la contienda belica de este tipo.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Crece cada dia mas el peligro de las maniobras de los belicistas norteamericanos para el ataque preventivo nuclear que resulta lo fundamental de su estrategia nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. cambio ya la "estrategia nuclear disuasiva", en que se mantenia en la epoca de Guerra Fria, por la de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. acelera la modernizacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares considerandolas como pilar de su estrategia militar del nuevo siglo.
					
					Para este fin, vino perfeccionando constantemente el sistema de ataque nuclear movilizando cuantiosos medios de golpe nuclear en los ejercicios belicos de distintas misiones.
					
					El bombardero "B-52" es el sofisticado medio de ataque preventivo nuclear, que ocupa la posicion de columna vertebral en las fuerzas nucleares estrategicas de EE.UU.
					
					Recientemente, los congresistas norteamericanos abogaron a gritos por modernizar los buques de las fuerzas navales norteamericanas y aumentar su numero para hacer frente al fortalecimiento de la marina de guerra de los potenciales paises hostiles como Rusia y China.
					
					Esto parte tambien de la intencion de dar condiciones favorables a la realizacion del ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					El intento estrategico de EE.UU. es finalizar la modernizacion de las fuerzas nucleares para tomar la hegemonia mundial doblegando a los paises hostiles con una absoluta supremacia nuclear.
					
					Pero, el mundo actual no gira como piensa el imperio.
					
					EE.UU. debe ver correctamente la realidad y abandonar su aventurero intento.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia posicion contradictoria de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia posicion contradictoria de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual publicado hoy, el periodico Minju Joson revela la posicion contradictoria de Estados Unidos que usa la pauta de doble rasero en el trato del problema nuclear.
					Al publicar recientemente su informe intermedio, el comite del Congreso norteamericano sobre la disposicion estrategica de EE.UU. acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e Iran senalando que debido a la "ambicion nuclear" de estos paises, se reportan uno tras otro los casos de proliferacion nuclear abriendo las posibilidades de que caigan en manos de los grupos terroristas las armas nucleares, comienza el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Por lo tanto, -continua ese documento- EE.UU. debe perseguir la estrategia de no proliferacion nuclear de alcance global y mantener una confiable y segura arma nuclear capaz de disuadir no solo a los paises hostiles sino tambien a los aliados.
					
					En contraste con este informe, ultimamente, EE.UU. intenta firmar el convenio nuclear con algunos paises del Medio Oriente. 
					
					Este hecho demuestra que no hay una pauta fija y correcta en la politica nuclear norteamericana que se altera facilmente segun los paises.
					
					Con esta injusta politica esta relacionado directa e indirectamente el problema nuclear surgido hoy en la arena internacional.
					
					Anteriormente, EE.UU. amenazo gravemente con armas nucleares a la RPDC y otros Estados sin estos artefactos, aparte de las provocaciones militares, aunque habia prometido lo contrario. 
					
					Paradojicamente, vino ayudando activamente el armamentismo nuclear de sus satelites despreciando la ley internacional.
					
					Un buen ejemplo de ello es Israel, que segun estimaciones, tiene ahora casi 200 armas nucleares.
					
					Esto es lo que hizo EE.UU. diciendo tanto que rechaza la proliferacion nuclear. 
					
					Este imperio maneja el problema nuclear partiendo de sus intereses estrategicos.
					
					Esta actitud parcial de EE.UU., que no valora con la misma pauta el problema nuclear de varios paises del mundo, esta complicando este asunto.  
					
					EE.UU. no podra liberarse de ninguna manera de la responsabilidad por la proliferacion nuclear.
